about_the_game:
They say the mind is the deadliest weapon of all – Now more than ever thanks to the research of NorTec’s Psychogenics Lab. Sign up today to unlock the hidden potential of the human brain!

This XenoShyft expansion enables the new Psychogenics Lab division and 5 new Psychogenics cards for your troops.

You only need this expansion if you want to play with the Psychogenics Lab division. You can play games that include this expansion without owning it.
detailed_description:
They say the mind is the deadliest weapon of all – Now more than ever thanks to the research of NorTec’s Psychogenics Lab. Sign up today to unlock the hidden potential of the human brain!

This XenoShyft expansion enables the new Psychogenics Lab division and 5 new Psychogenics cards for your troops.

You only need this expansion if you want to play with the Psychogenics Lab division. You can play games that include this expansion without owning it.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz dual-core Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M (1GB GDDR5)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: XenoShyft - Psychogenics Lab

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 2.4 GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5200+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 7 series or ATI Radeon HD 2000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Mid to High Range Dual-Core 2.5GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 285 or AMD Radeon HD 5830
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
